author: dain
msg: Applied GERONIMO-2377 deploying a new datasource with the same name does not indicate any problem in the console

author: mriou
msg: Replaced the dependency on the Xerces version embedded in the JDK with a direct dependency on Xerces and Xalan. Made a 3 hours offrand to the Maven gods to get the right versions of both Xerces and Xalan to be picked, without duplicates.

author: simoneg
msg: COCOON-1966 Multiple row addition, thanks Jeroen Reijn

author: mriou
msg: Implemented a simple process definition reaping thread. The idea is the disassociate the process definition from the BpelProcess instance when it hasn't been used for a certain time. The objective is to reduce the memory footprint of the engine when a very large quantity of processes are deployed in ODE.

msg: Work in progress of BytesMessage and StreamMessage work
